00034 class NMFMultiplicativeDivergenceUpdate
00035 {
00036  public:
00037   // Empty constructor required for the WUpdateRule template.

00060   template<typename MatType>
00061   inline static void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00062                             arma::mat& W,
00063                             const arma::mat& H)
00064   {
00065     // Simple implementation left in the header file.
00066     arma::mat t1;
00067     arma::rowvec t2;
00068 
00069     t1 = W * H;
00070     for (size_t i = 0; i < W.n_rows; ++i)
00071     {
00072       for (size_t j = 0; j < W.n_cols; ++j)
00073       {
00074         // Writing this as a single expression does not work as of Armadillo
00075         // 3.920.  This should be fixed in a future release, and then the code
00076         // below can be fixed.
00077         //t2 = H.row(j) % V.row(i) / t1.row(i);
00078         t2.set_size(H.n_cols);
00079         for (size_t k = 0; k < t2.n_elem; ++k)
00080         {
00081           t2(k) = H(j, k) * V(i, k) / t1(i, k);
00082         }
00083 
00084         W(i, j) = W(i, j) * sum(t2) / sum(H.row(j));
00085       }
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00102   template<typename MatType>
00103   inline static void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00104                             const arma::mat& W,
00105                             arma::mat& H)
00106   {
00107     // Simple implementation left in the header file.
00108     arma::mat t1;
00109     arma::colvec t2;
00110 
00111     t1 = W * H;
00112     for (size_t i = 0; i < H.n_rows; i++)
00113     {
00114       for (size_t j = 0; j < H.n_cols; j++)
00115       {
00116         // Writing this as a single expression does not work as of Armadillo
00117         // 3.920.  This should be fixed in a future release, and then the code
00118         // below can be fixed.
00119         //t2 = W.col(i) % V.col(j) / t1.col(j);
00120         t2.set_size(W.n_rows);
00121         for (size_t k = 0; k < t2.n_elem; ++k)
00122         {
00123           t2(k) = W(k, i) * V(k, j) / t1(k, j);
00124         }
00125 
00126         H(i,j) = H(i,j) * sum(t2) / sum(W.col(i));
00127       }
00128     }
00129   }
00130 };
